title: Mirror of Germany. No. 158 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Visits of state
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Go-cart racing in Munich; procession on the feast day of St Leonard in South Bavaria, a special kind of hunting ground in Munich - a museum; King Hussein's visit to Bonn; Nobel prize winner, Professor Eigen; Jazz Ballet at Mannhein in rehearsal, and a ship cemetery at Korbmachersand. A new sculptor in the Ruhr and an experiment in Hamburg's fashionable main street to test city folk's knowledge of the country. Shooting the rapids over a five mile course at Monschau.
